name: Zombie Toss in a Red Wine Sauce
name_original: Zombie Toss in a Red Wine Sauce
description:
Zombie Toss in a Red Wine Sauce is an arcade game developed by Flying Wisdom Studios. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Flying Wisdom Studios. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Zombie Toss in a Red Wine Sauce is available on iOS and Android.
